00019 MTime::MTime()
00020       {
00021       _tick = 0;
00022       _nominator = 0;
00023       _denominator = 4;
00024       tickTime = false;
00025       }

00030       }

00041 void MTime::setTick(int t)
00042       {
00043       _tick = t;
00044       tickTime = true;
00045       }
00046 
00047 //---------------------------------------------------------
00048 //   setFrac
00049 //---------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 void MTime::setFrac(int z, int n)
00052       {
00053       _nominator = z;
00054       _denominator = n;
00055       switch(_denominator) {
00056             case 1:   _tick = division*4;   break;
00057             case 2:   _tick = division*2;   break;
00058             case 4:   _tick = division;     break;
00059             case 8:   _tick = division/2;   break;
00060             case 16:  _tick = division/4;   break;
00061             case 32:  _tick = division/8;   break;
00062             case 64:  _tick = division/16;  break;
00063             case 128: _tick = division/32;  break;
00064             case 256: _tick = division/64;  break;
00065             case 512: _tick = division/128; break;
00066             }
00067       _tick *= _nominator;
00068       tickTime = false;
00069       }
